title.native: 便利屋斎藤さん、異世界に行く

description:
Handyman Saitou has never felt special in his life. When he’s dropped into a medieval fantasy world, he gathers a party of unique beings to survive. Surrounded by a heavy warrior, a spell-forgetting wizard, and even a divine fairy princess, he yearns to be helpful. But after Saitou saves everyone during a raid, it’s clear that having a handyman on an adventure isn’t just useful, it’s essential!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Fairy
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

tags.name: Seinen
tags.description: Target demographic is adult males.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Dungeon
tags.description: Prominently features a dungeon environment.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Ninja
tags.description: Prominently features Japanese warriors traditionally trained in espionage, sabotage and assasination.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Age Regression
tags.description: Prominently features a character who was returned to a younger state.

tags.name: Mixed Gender Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several people, regardless of gender, who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Goblin
tags.description: A goblin is a monstrous creature from European folklore. They are almost always small and grotesque, mischievous or outright malicious, and greedy. Sometimes with magical abilities.

node.description:
__[Profile (Miracle Bus)](https://miraclebus.com/composer/tomotakaosumi)__

__Tomotaka Oosumi__ is a Japanese bassist, lyricist, composer and arranger who has been active since 2002. He is affiliated with the Miracle Bus Corporation.

**[Profile (Kamitsubaki Studio)](https://kamitsubaki.jp/artist/mimi/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@MIMI...../) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mimi_3mi)**

VOCALOID producer who debuted in 2016. MIMI joined Sinsekai Studio in November 2022 and is now affiliated with Kamitsubaki Studio under the Sinsekai Record sub-label, following the integration of Sinsekai Studio into Kamitsubaki in July 2023.

**[Official Site](https://r.goope.jp/konoco) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ko_noco/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ko_noco) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@konoco6408)**

__konoco__ is a Japanese singer and utaite with a rather husky, yet slightly soft and delicate voice. She can make her voice sound cute or mature, depending on the song. She is also active as a model for apparel brands. While actively performing live, she writes lyrics and composes music for her own apparel brand "LOOP," which she produces, as well as collaborative products and other non-music activities.

**[Profile (Kamitsubaki Studio)](https://kamitsubaki.jp/artist/mimi/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@MIMI...../) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mimi_3mi)**

VOCALOID producer who debuted in 2016. MIMI joined Sinsekai Studio in November 2022 and is now affiliated with Kamitsubaki Studio under the Sinsekai Record sub-label, following the integration of Sinsekai Studio into Kamitsubaki in July 2023.

Japanese 3D illustrator. Also creates custom puppets, predominantly out of clay.
__Mike McFarland__ is an American voice actor, ADR Director, Script, and Line Producer at Funimation Entertainment.

Jared Smith is an American YouTuber and voice actor.
ADR Engineer at FUNimation Entertainment, however has since expanded to also being a Mixing Engineer.
